duties_responsibilities.duty: Execute the product vision and optimize the user experience and functionality of software platforms.
Work in software application development using .NET, C#, JavaScript, TypeScript, Angular, and SQL.
Voice ideas and participate in group learning to make databases and interfaces user-friendly, functional, and scalable.

education_certification.credential: Pursuing a Bachelor or Master's degree in Engineering, Computer Science, Management Information or related field (or equivalent experience).
